蚹字的基本解释

蚹
fù
蛇腹下代替足爬行的横鳞：“吾待蛇蚹蜩翼耶？”
爬：“又过阎王碥、阎王峡，皆蚹行。”

蚹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
(1)蛇腹下代足爬行的横鳞。
(2)蛇皮。
(3)见“蚹蠃”。

蚹字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚹； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1079第26
【唐韻】符遇切，音附。蚹蛇，腹下橫鱗可行者。【莊子·齊物論】吾待蛇蚹、蜩翼耶。【註】蚹謂蛇腹下齟齬，可以行者也。　又【爾雅·釋魚】蚹蠃，螔蝓。【註】卽蝸牛。詳蝓字註。　又【集韻】步木切，音僕。義同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋蟲】蚹蠃，螔蝓。〕　謹照原書釋蟲改釋魚。
蚹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蚹字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm
Basic explanation of words
Worm
fù
The horizontal scales crawling under the snake's belly instead of the foot: "I'll wait for the snake worm to have its wings?"
Climb: "Go past Yan Wangsi and Yan Wangxia again, and they will all walk."
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" Fu Yuqie, Quyu, Feng. ]
(1) The horizontal scales crawling under the snake's belly.
(2) Snake skin.
(3) See "Cormbs".
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚹; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1079 26
[Tang Yun] Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. Viper, viable horizontal scales under the abdomen. 【Zhuangzi·Qiwu Theory】I'm waiting for snake worms and centipede wings. [Note] The worm is said to be indiscreet under the belly of a snake, and it is possible to do it.　[Erya·Shiyu] worm, worm. [Note] 卽 snail. Detailed note of the word worm.　[Jiyun] Step by step, sound servant. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Erya·Release insects] worms, worms. 〕　I would like to change the release of fish according to the original book.
Worm
